definition: (in Roman numerals, M written with a macron over it) denoting a quantity consisting of 1,000,000 items or units, the number that is represented as a one followed by 6 zeros
details:
adjective
- (in Roman numerals, M written with a macron over it) denoting a quantity consisting of 1,000,000 items or units
noun
- the number that is represented as a one followed by 6 zeros
= synonyms: one thousand thousand, meg
- a very large indefinite number (usually hyperbole)
= example: a very large indefinite number (usually hyperbole)
= synonyms: zillion
